200.description: The list of role assignments.

BillingRoleAssignment.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources.

BillingRoleAssignmentListResult.description: A container for a list of resources

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

createdOn.description: The date the role assignment was created.

createdByPrincipalTenantId.description: The tenant Id of the user who created the role assignment.

createdByPrincipalId.description: The principal ID of the user who created the role assignment.

createdByUserEmailAddress.description: The email address of the user who created the role assignment. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

notificationContact.description: The Notification Contact person email address

principalId.description: The principal id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

roleDefinitionId.description: The ID of the role definition.

scope.description: The scope at which the role was assigned.

userAuthenticationType.description: The authentication type of the user, whether Organization or MSA, of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

userEmailAddress.description: The email address of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

principalTenantName.description: The friendly name of the tenant of the user to whom the role was assigned. This will be 'Primary Tenant' for the primary tenant of the billing account.

principalDisplayName.description: The display name of the principal to whom the role was assigned.

principalType.description: The type of a role Assignment.
